sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../context/AuthContext'; import { Activity, User, Clock, TrendingUp, Stethoscope, Calendar } from 'lucide-react'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const quickStats = [ { icon: Activity, title: 'Predictions Made', value: '0', color: 'text-blue-600', bg: 'bg-blue-100' }, { icon: Clock, title: 'Last Prediction', value: 'Never', color: 'text-green-600', bg: 'bg-green-100' }, { icon: TrendingUp, title: 'Accuracy Rate', value: '100%', color: 'text-purple-600', bg: 'bg-purple-100' }, { icon: Stethoscope, title: 'Health Score', value: 'Good', color: 'text-emerald-600', bg: 'bg-emerald-100' } ]; const recentActivity = [ { type: 'account', message: 'Account created successfully', time: 'Just now', icon: User } ]; return (
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome back, {user?.first_name}!

Ready to check your health with our AI-powered system?

Start New Prediction
{/* Quick Stats */}
{quickStats.map((stat, index) => (

{stat.value}

{stat.title}

))}
{/* Main Content Grid */}
{/* Profile Information */}

Profile Information

{user?.first_name} {user?.last_name}

{user?.email}

{user?.role}

Today

{/* Recent Activity & Quick Actions */}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

{recentActivity.map((activity, index) => (

{activity.message}

{activity.time}

))}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

New Prediction

Analyze your symptoms

History

View past predictions

{/* Health Tips */}

💡 Daily Health Tip

Regular health checkups and monitoring your symptoms can help catch potential health issues early. Use our AI prediction system as a supplementary tool, but always consult with healthcare professionals for proper medical advice.

); }; export default Dashboard;
